document_data.name: Vichorn Vrockwing
document_data.mainbody: '''Vichorn Vrockwing''' was a [[tiefling]] who frequented the [[Driftwood Tavern]] in [[Neverwinter]] around [[1484 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Vichorn wanted to recruit a tiefling adventurer, claiming there was a bargain between his master and the adventurer's ancestors, to sabotage the [[Ashmadai]].
